snippet: The Bruins stayed in the playoff hunt by picking up 2 points. They are now a point ahead of the Philadelphia Flyers for the eighth seed in the Eastern Conference.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Boston Bruins defeats Detroit Red Wings, 5-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Bruins stayed in the playoff hunt by picking up 2 points. They are now a point ahead of the Philadelphia Flyers for the eighth seed in the Eastern Conference.

headline.print_headline: Boston Beats Detroit, Bolstering Playoff Hopes
headline.main: Boston Routs Detroit, Bolstering Playoff Hopes
